means: 毕宿五（金牛座中的一等星）

sentence.Network_en: It's easy overlook Aldebaran in this scene , but this star is the brightest one in Taurus.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然毕宿五是金牛座里最明亮的一颗星星, 但它很容易就隐于夜幕之下.

sentence.Network_en: We ear are fascinated by Mars, and might tend to overlook Aldebaran in tomorrow's morning scene.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们很快就会被火星密迷住, 可能忽略掉毕宿五在明天早晨的景象.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 原来是这样哦`~~~~~阿鲁狄巴aldebaran天文：毕宿五(金牛座中的一等星)
aldea 阿尔代亚, aldebaran 毕宿五, aldea 阿尔德亚

auth_sentence.content: This sees all entrants use the same robot - a small humanoid called Nao made by French firm Aldebaran Robotics.
auth_sentence.res_content: This sees all entrants use the same robot - a small humanoid called Nao made by French firm Aldebaran Robotics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This sees all entrants use the same robot - a small humanoid called Nao made by French firm Aldebaran Robotics.
